name: LARVA
description:
>>> NOTE: You may have to click the game after it loads to set focus for input. <<< Story

Congratulations young LARVA! we have a special mission as the last remaining species from Ceti Alpha V you must retrieve a vital data disc that will give us the technology we need to save our world.

Little do they know we have spent generations upon generations for this very moment. Us indigenous slugs built a reputation for torture but it has always been so much more than that!

Find the green disk! and make the humans fart too! Good luck little buddy!

Controls A - left D - right space - jump use brain nodes with marked abilities to maneuver the character in the mini display Jimmy Briggs
Game Design / Art Andrew Kaczorek
Concept / Music Chris Chalfant
Concept / SFX
